data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting 03.02.2025
data.news_body:
1. Standalone and Consolidated Un-Audited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter ended 31.12.2024 have been approved.

2. Declared 250% Interim Dividend for FY 2024-25 (Rs.2.50 per equity share of Re.1/- each).

3. Record date for the Interim Dividend is fixed as 07.02.2025 for determining the Shareholders who are entitled for the same.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Audited Financial Results For The Quarter / Year Ended 31St March, 2022.
data.news_body:
Further to our Notice under reference, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of
the Company at their Meeting held this day 27.04.2022 has:
1. Approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter / Year ended
31st March, 2022, both Standalone & Consolidated.
2. Recommended a Final Dividend of Rs.0.15 Per share (15 %) on the face value of Re.1/-
each.

Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Meeting Of Board Of Directors Of The Company Held On
07.02.2022
data.news_body:
Further to our Notice under reference, we wish to inform you that the Board of
Directors of the Company at their Meeting held on 07th February, 2022 have
approved the following:
1. Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter ended
31st December, 2021 (Standalone and Consolidated)
2. Buyback of the fully paid-up equity shares of the Company of face value of
Re.1/- each.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 27.07.2021
data.news_body:
the Board of
Directors of the Company at their Meeting held on 27th July, 2021 have approved the
following:
1. Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter ended
30th June, 2021
i. Standalone ii. Consolidated
In this connection, we are sending herewith the Certified True Copies of the
aforesaid Results along with the Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory
Auditors of the Company.
2. Sub-division of one Equity Share of Rs.5/- each fully paid up into Five Equity
Share of Re.1/- each fully paid up, subject to the approval of the Shareholders
of the Company.
3. Amendment to Capital Clause of Memorandum of Association to give effect to
the above.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter/Year Ended 31St March, 2021.
data.news_body:
we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of
the Company at their Meeting held this day 28.04.2021 has:
1.Approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter I Year ended
31st March, 2021, both Standalone & Consolidated.
2.Recommended a Final Dividend of Rs.0.7TPer share (<5%) on the face value of Rs.5/-
each.
